message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal and you know it's worth more than that to you. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is important to you, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $100 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down a bit to $125, but that's my final offer. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet it at $125. I would like to counteroffer at $110. I hope this is within your range.
Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best price, but $110 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $117. This is my final offer, let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to meet in the middle. However, I am still unable to agree at $117. I would like to counteroffer at $115. I hope this is within your acceptable range.
